text:
Bernstein expects a massive copper shortage to begin in 2027 right as AI infrastructure moves into mass scale.

AI only scales on electricity and electricity scales on copper because a single $NVDA Blackwell rack pulls ~130 kilowatts and every megawatt delivered to a data center requires copper at every layer of the stack.

This also lines up almost perfectly with Blackwell moving into mass deployment, inference overtaking training and hyperscalers shifting from single flagship data centers to regional clusters.

Everyone is trying to double capacity at the same time which is why the AI supercycle and the copper supercycle are the same cycle.

A bullish setup for me is when the 9-day EMA is above the 21-day EMA & the stock is holding both the 50-day & 200-day SMA so both momentum + structure are moving in the same direction.

If the only level a stock is holding is the 200-day SMA then the long-term trend is still intact but the momentum has faded so I treat it as a hold.

When the price breaks below all three levels then that is when I consider the trend bearish because the short-term, intermediate & long-term signals are all pointing the same way.

FUTURUM EQUITIES PODCAST EPISODE #28

Daniel & I dove into four big themes:

1. Davos 2026 quietly confirmed a regime shift
The conversations weren‚Äôt about AI potential anymore but were about power constraints, deployment timelines & who actually controls bottlenecks. 

2. Why I added a new software position during SaaSpocalypse 2026
In an agentic world, the agent becomes the worker but the system of record becomes the manager and this software name fits that profile. 

3. The new bar for software in the AI economy
The winners won‚Äôt be the tools people use but the systems they can‚Äôt operate without which means ownership of data flow, control over outcomes & tight integration with hardware, infrastructure or regulated environments. If a software company doesn‚Äôt sit on a control point then margins will compress.

4. A special announcement we‚Äôve been building toward for six months
An exciting way to be able to participate in the builders of tomorrow for the investors of today.

Gold now accounts for 25% of total world reserves. Still below the USD as a % share, and it remains far below its share in the 70s & 80s. In other words, if the recent reasons for buying gold persist, it can keep rising.

"We'll go to zero [allocation] on the gold trade... one of two things has to happen. The first time we see a central bank say 'we are done in our gold buying program' or on the day that I change my name from Rosenberg to Goldberg"

Murders in DC fell 40%, violent crime down as well (e.g., robberies -39%, armed carjackings -53%.
